front.title: Use Identity as Raw Public Key in EAP-TLS

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of identity as a raw public key in EAP-TLS and EAP-TLS13, EAP-TLS defined in RFC 5216. The protocol procedures of EAP-TLS-IBS will comply with EAP-TLS and EAP-TLS13, Identity-based signature will be extended to support EAP-TLS's signature algorithms.
